header.tagline: The right election calculator for millions of voters in 4 countries
home.page.metadata.title: Calculator.1
home.page.metadata.description: The true election calculator for millions of voters in 4 countries
home.page.title: We build the Election Calculator that helps you decide who to vote for
home.page.intro.p1: We are the <kohoVolitLink>KohoVolit.eu</kohoVolitLink> association, and for 15 years we have been creating the <kalkulackaLink>Election Calculator</kalkulackaLink> to help you make an informed decision about who to vote for.
home.page.intro.p2: In 2022, with support from <ceskoDigitalLink>ÄŒesko.Digital</ceskoDigitalLink>, we launched a new generation of the Election Calculator with a new design. Now we are entering the next phase: international expansion. We have already launched calculators in 6 countries, with more on the way:
home.page.p3: Our election calculators are used by hundreds of thousands of voters every year. In 2023 alone, the presidential calculator in Czechia was completed by over 1 million people!
home.page.cta.title: Support the Election Calculator. Or get involved!
home.page.cta.p1: To continue creating the calculators, we need your support. <supportLink>Support us</supportLink> or <volunteerLink>join our team of volunteers</volunteerLink> and help us further develop the Election Calculator. Thank you!
